page.title: 08FARMS IN COTMARSH.
page.content:
{Cotmarsh}is along a small lane coming off the road from Broad Town to Wootton Bassett. { It is a wet place so in some places in Cotmarsh{since the war people have tile drained the fields to make it drier land and some of the tile drains are still in some of the fields today.To tile drain you have to use{porus}pipes which lets the water in to the pipe but not out so when the water gets into the pipe it runs into a ditch.There are four farms in Cotmarsh.Great Cotmash is the biggest for land.Others in order of size are: Tynings, Little Cotmarsh,& New Farm.
Farm Summary on page 12
